branchCategory.name: TILM
branchCategory.description: The TILM is an advanced flexible, heat and chemical resistant tubing that is compatible with a wide range of fluids, and can resist temperatures up to 500°F. This tubing comes in four colors – red, black, blue and translucent.  In addition, the size and length variations have been extended allowing you to select exactly what is needed in 9 inch size options. The TILM can also be ordered in seven different lengths from 2 meters straight type up to 100 meter rolls. Developed to be combined with our extensive line of fittings, the addition of the TILM tube provides a complete solution for your piping equipment needs.

branchItem.name: TILM, Inch Size Fluoropolymer Tubing (PFA)
branchItem.description: The TILM is an advanced flexible, heat and chemical resistant tubing that is compatible with a wide range of fluids, and can resist temperatures up to 500°F. This tubing comes in four colors – red, black, blue and translucent.  In addition, the size and length variations have been extended allowing you to select exactly what is needed in 9 inch size options. The TILM can also be ordered in seven different lengths from 2 meters straight type up to 100 meter rolls. Developed to be combined with our extensive line of fittings, the addition of the TILM tube provides a complete solution for your piping equipment needs.
